item.title: microformat and Live Clipboard roundup
item.description: The buzz surrounding microformats and how they can be used to create new and better services is getting louder and louder. In the past month there have been some eye-opening blog postings and articles on them. Here are just a few to whet the appetite: Phil Haack has the best introduction to microformats I have read. Alex Barnett coins a new acronym with mRc = microformats + RSS + clipboard. His article and Jason Kolb’s really address some of the exciting possibilities presented by Ray Ozzie’s Live Clipboard.
